fields.title: About Django Content Manager
fields.content:
This project

Soon, there will be a little bit more information here about exactly what this project is, as well as how it works.

Contact the developer

Email me at cms@monokro.me, or message me (and learn more about django) on IRC at the official django chat room: #django on irc.freenode.net. My nickname is monokrome.

Are you a developer?

The source code to this site can be found on GitHub, and is based on several other projects:

  • django-cms (the actual content management system)
  • django-news
  • django-themes
  • django-navigation
  • django-base
